title: Bow of the Banshee
content:
Bow of the Banshee Rare 2~7 Damage 1d6+1Piercing Blood-Curdling Emission: On a hit, possibly inflict Frightened. Gain a +1d4 bonus to attack and damage against Frightened creatures. Weapon Enchantment +1 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: The impression of an elven face screams silently from the finely curved bow - the image becomes even more disturbing when the bowstring snaps forward on release, emitting a blood-curdling wail. Shortbow 18m Two-Handed 0.9 190
